case.title: Drinks tonight? - 44 (Astoria)
case.text:
Hi
I'm looking for an attractive lady to meet with for drinks tonight in Astoria and have a good time. Im 44 single guy, no baggage, 5'10 160 lb, educated, easy going and down to earth. If you feel like going out tonight, then please send your pictures and tell me a little bit about yourself. If we connect then we'll take it from there.
Thanks
